name: Salvage (itch) (Sealbee Games)
description:
What will you leave behind for a future you'll never see?

Salvage is a narrative puzzle game made in Unreal Engine 5 in conjunction with the Unreal Sensei Master Class. It can be found here: 

https://www.unrealsenseiacademy.com/products/unreal-engine-5-master-class

This game was a learning experience and is free to play. Any donations will go to recouping cost of assets and buying the voice actor a coffee.

V1 Known Issues:

  • Selecting "Start" in Main Menu once game is completed breaks checkpoint. Hit "New Game" instead to reset.
  • Dissolving blocks are working as intended, but this sometimes leaves players without the ability to solve puzzles. Hit ESC and Restart Checkpoint to reset all blocks.
